html:
5.11.17  4:41 pm   "what did you do for the last 11 months "

     i was making a video

      dont act like a piece of shit you piece of shit.

5.11.17  4:38 pm   whyd you first make this website?

     to post all the things i had done

5.11.17  4:33 pm   Is this question??

     yes

5.11.17  3:21 pm   Will you make more history of x videos pls

     i would like to perhaps do something a little bit different

5.11.17  2:21 pm   whos ur main in super smash bros

     link

5.11.17  12:53 pm   Will you narrate my life?

     i have to finish narrating my own first

5.11.17  12:11 pm   how would you be everything if you are nothing and everything is nothing but nothing is everything

     how about being something

5.11.17  12:01 pm   Can you tell the future?

     sometimes i can guess, but then it's allowed to be different

5.11.17  11:28 am   Where can I donate bitcoin for you?

     i'm not sure, right now i only have these ways you can donate. that will have to work for now

5.11.17  10:56 am   Can I hire you to do jingles for a project?

     there is a long waiting list

5.11.17  10:28 am   Your videos are the best when are you going to wise up and make it a full time gig and make them all the time?

     i already make them all the time. i have been making them non-stop since early 2014

5.11.17  10:12 am   What would be your melee weapon of choice in a zombie apocalypse?

     thinking about my feelings

5.11.17  10:08 am   Why are you doing this? 15000 answers x 10 sec per answer = wasting 41 hours and 40 minutes of your life. That is worth roughly $300 at min wage.

     it just seems like the right thing to do

5.11.17  9:37 am   i dont wanna die. ever. help?

     just try to do the best you can in the meantime, and then i think whatever happens next will eventually make sense

5.11.17  9:28 am   do you feel a massive burden has been lifted off of your shoulders now that History Of The World is out?

     yes, although there are new, more interesting burdens

5.11.17  9:09 am   how long did it take to make the history of the entire world video?

     about 11 months

5.11.17  8:36 am   why can't i asjk a question?

     you can. sorry for the confusion

5.11.17  7:49 am   do you still have a bad car?

     now it's a little worse

5.11.17  7:18 am   Are you a dog?

     no

5.11.17  6:51 am   The obvious part: I like your videos. The question part: do you like any philosophies or religions more than the rest at this particular moment?

     i think it's best when you can merge them

5.11.17  6:07 am   What do you look like?

     i'm not sure

5.11.17  5:57 am   Bill, Hotewig was fantastic! Was this video in your mind before you even started HoJ?

     i probably would have thought it was too insane to try until i tried something smaller first

5.11.17  5:12 am   how long will medium length videos be?

     i'd say anywhere between 20 seconds and 4 minutes

5.11.17  4:38 am   Was the stress that working on HoTEWIG caused you worth the payoff of finally getting it done?

     we'll see

5.11.17  4:13 am   do you think of everything?

     no

5.11.17  4:03 am   As a Swede I'm a little sad that the nordic countries was only mentioned once and that wasn't our finest moment in history, are we really not that interesting?

     i don't know if you realize how many fights i had with myself last summer trying to fit in as much as i did. i spent at least 3 months juggling the script around to try to fit in as much as possible while also keep the video short enough to make in less than a year. i'm so sorry. i tried my best

5.11.17  3:39 am   Everyone likes your videos.

     that's not true

      Do you like your videos?

     i try to make them how i like them

5.11.17  3:35 am   Are you still gonna make small songs?

     how about medium songs

5.11.17  3:09 am   if i put things in a bag, and put that bag in another bag, but then put that bag among other things, is the bag with a bag of things also a thing?

     oh hell yeah. perhaps even a thing of bags
5.11.17  2:28 am   What time zone is this?

5.11.17  2:06 am   MY FREND I AM IN DESPAIR. HOW CAN U MAKE A VIDEO OF WORLD HISTORY YET NEGLECT OTHER CITIZENS OF THE WORLD?? THE AP EXAM WAS A DAY EARLIER FOR NON-UNITED STATES CITIZENS IN ASIA BC OF DIFFERENT TIME ZONES SO WE WERE UNABLE TO VIEW YOUR MASTERPIECE OF A VIDEO.

     i'm sorry. i worked on it for 11 months and i tried to have it done as soon as possible. what did you do for the last 11 months

5.11.17  1:59 am   LISTEN HERE U PUNK. SO I WALK OUT OF MY AP WORLD HISTORY EXAM IN TEARS JUST FIND OUT THAT YOU JUST UPLOADED A VIDEO OF THE ENTIRE HISTORY OF THE WORLD. SON IF U HAD POSTED THIS A DAY EARLIER I WOULD HAVE BEEN SAVED BUT NO,,, NOW I CAN'T EVEN WATCH THE VIDEO BC OF PTSD FROM MY TRAUMATIC WURTZ-FREE EXAM EXPERIENCE. THAT IS ALL.

     apparently i got the wrong louis. so you might have gotten that wrong. if i posted it a day earlier, there might have been something else wrong, such as kuomintang spelled kuamintang

5.11.17  1:52 am   im lonely

     me too

5.11.17  1:35 am   How do you even begin to do stuff?

     you have to finish not doing everything first

5.11.17  1:24 am   What is?

     most things. actually no, probably about half i'd say

5.11.17  12:50 am   Did you ever end up getting yourself a graphic tablet and revolutionizing your game?

     oh hell yeah. i want to thank the person who suggested it, sometime last summer
5.11.17  12:50 am   Are you a robot? You know, you are legally required to tell me if you are a robot.

5.11.17  12:32 am   Why did you change the script in the History of Japan video from the one you have on your website?

     to make it better

5.11.17  12:06 am   are you prepared for unwanted advances by delusional people who don't even know you but feel somehow that they know something about who you "are" in someway?

     i am already quite used to that

5.10.17  11:46 pm   Damn, how do you keep up with all of these questions?

     by skipping most of them

5.10.17  11:27 pm   I don't have a question I'm sorry

     that's ok

5.10.17  11:12 pm   how long do you plan on responding to questions here?

     as long as i can
5.10.17  10:48 pm   What is your musical inspiration?

5.10.17  10:34 pm   are you up to date on the hippest new marketing techniques?

     i use my own techniques, even though i receive a lot of pressure to use other techniques. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.10.17  10:21 pm   on a scale from -1 to 42 how much do you like hamburger helper

     i have never tried it

5.10.17  10:04 pm   nice video. Do you know when you'll start uploading songs again?

     immediately

5.10.17  9:36 pm   have you ever had to pull an all-nighter f0r a video

     does it count if you wake up at the beginning of the night, work all night, and then go to sleep in the morning

5.10.17  9:16 pm   CONGRATS ITS [HOTWIG] OUT now what

     i can't tell you

5.10.17  8:58 pm   Can we meet in person?

     sure

5.10.17  8:43 pm   What affinity do you have with umbrellas?

     it's raining garbage. the umbrella is to protect me from all the garbage

     Btw, congrats on the new vid.

     thasnk
